page.title: 13WHAT'S ON? WHERE IS IT?
page.content: The village life still revolves round the school, churches, the village hall and the new Leisure Centre.The Red Dragon Hall was built in 1964; the new modern building replacing the old, wooden ex-army hut which came to Velindre soon after the First World War.The local community derived such a lot of culture and amusement from the old building and the new modern complex carries on the same tradition. It is the meeting place of the village.The Women's Institute and Merched y Wawr meet monthly,the doctor's surgery is in use weekly, a babies' clinic is held monthly and various committees meet regularly.The Snooker Tables attract the young and old from the village and surrounding districts.Bazaars, Coffee Evenings, concerts and dramas are held to raise funds for local charities.{M.DAVIES.
